name: Catastrophe (Enderderder, GenghisGhan, TheJamesJohnstone)
description:
Third year final project at Media Design School with a 6 man team.

Catastrophe is a 3rd person stealth adventure game where you play as the Cat Thief and must take down the Cat Mafia.

Programmers: Richard Wulansari | James Johnstone

Artists: Chris Haybittle | Larisa Isaeva | Ghan Satjipanon | John Gabitan
